display_long_description:
New MR game aiming for social card game as a family sports!
Looking for an awesome and enjoyable social card game? Here you go!

“The Joy of Playing” with a new experience combining AR and MR on Quest
Sports Royal is a social card game that combines AR and MR.

“The Joy of Meeting” with friends from all over the world
Sports Royal is a global multiplayer game through Quest.
This game can be played using virtual currency and interacting with friends or competing with other players.

“The Joy of Watching” with various customizing items
You can uniquely customize your avatar while playing the game and entertain your eyes using various in-game special effects.

"The Joy of Spending" to pursue pleasure
Experience thrilling happiness with free/paid chips.

FEATURES:
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Play with friends and family
🥽 Exciting experience of AR and MR
🎇 Fun game items
🏆 Competitive play with others on leader board

⚠️Our games are designed purely for entertainment and recreational purposes. These games do not involve real-money gambling or provide any chance to win real currency.
